values.description: Base URL for the AI Audit PDF Server. Change to your production URL when needed.
JWT token for authentication - automatically set by Generate Token endpoint. Expires in 24 hours by default.
Automatically set by PDF generation requests. Used for download and file info endpoints.
Client ID for production authentication (optional - only needed for production mode). Set API_CLIENT_ID in server's .env file.
Client Secret for production authentication (optional - only needed for production mode). Set API_CLIENT_SECRET in server's .env file.
